component.name: MovieData
component.script:
sub setFields() datum = m.top.json
m.top.id = datum.id m.top.title = datum.name m.top.overview = datum.overview m.top.favorite = datum.UserData.isFavorite m.top.watched = datum.UserData.played
if datum.posterURL <> invalid m.top.posterURL = datum.posterURL else m.top.posterURL = "" end if end sub
